TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PasteDoneHandler(object o, PasteDoneArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PasteDoneHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PasteDoneHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PasteDoneHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PasteDoneHandler is removed from the event.
